Desc: Holder's Ability cannot be changed by any effect.
An item to be held by a Pokémon. This single-use bulb boosts the Sp. Atk stat if the holder is damaged by a Water-type attack.
An item to be held by Dialga. This large glowing gem wells with power and allows the Pokémon to change form.
A brightly shining gem to be held by Dialga. It boosts the power of Dialga's Dragon- and Steel-type moves.
It is activated when the holder's HP reaches ¼, and it restores the Pokémon's HP by ½.
Holder is immune to Ground-type attacks. Pops when holder is hit.
It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Alolan Raichu's Thunderbolt to a Z-Move.
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles any prize money received as long as the holder joins the battle at least once.
Holder's Sp. Def is 1.5x, but it can only select damaging moves.
A berry-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this it spins around happily.
Boosts ATTACK but causes confusion.
An item to be held by a Pokémon. This root boosts the amount of HP the holder restores to itself when it uses HP-stealing moves.
An item to be held by a Pokémon. This band boosts the power of binding moves used by the holder.
Holder's Fighting-type attacks have 1.2x power.
Holder's Dark-type attacks have 1.2x power.
Each turn, if holder is a Poison type, restores 1/16 max HP; loses 1/8 if not.
A shiny blue orb that is said to have a deep connection to a legend of the Hoenn region.
When a Pokémon holds this during a contest it looks even more beautiful than usual.
If the holder misses due to accuracy, its Speed is raised by 2 stages. Single use.
Activates the Protosynthesis or Quark Drive Abilities. Single use.
An item to be held by a Pokémon. This glittery powder casts a tricky glare that lowers the accuracy of opposing Pokémon's moves.
An item to be held by a Pokémon. This gem is imbued with the essence of bugs and will boost the power of a Bug-type move—but only once.
A memory disc that contains Bug-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.
It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Bug-type moves to Bug-type Z-Moves.
A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Genesect's Techno Blast move so it becomes Fire type.

A clover-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this it spins around happily.
